name: Main Floor
svgContent:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<svg viewBox="0 0 1400 1000" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Restaurant Floor Plan - Indoor and Outdoor Sections -->
  
  <!-- OUTDOOR SECTION (Top) -->
  <g id="outdoor-section">
    <!-- Outdoor background - full width -->
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="1400" height="400" fill="#e8f5e9" stroke="none"/>
    
    <!-- Walkway extending from door -->
    <rect x="550" y="0" width="100" height="400" fill="#d0d0d0" stroke="none"/>
    
    <!-- Outdoor title -->
    <text x="700" y="20" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#4caf50">Outdoor Patio Area</text>
    
    <!-- Row D - Small round tables (furthest from window) -->
    <g id="row-d-tables">
      <!-- D5 (far left - extended beyond store) -->
      <g id="table-d5-group">
        <circle id="table-d5" cx="100" cy="50" r="25" 
                fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
                data-number="D5" data-capacity="2"/>
        <text x="100" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">D5</text>
        <circle cx="75" cy="50" r="8" fill="#689f38" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
        <circle cx="125" cy="50" r="8" fill="#689f38" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      </g>
      <!-- D3 -->
      <g id="table-d3-group">
        <circle id="table-d3" cx="300" cy="50" r="25" 
                fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
                data-number="D3" data-capacity="2"/>
        <text x="300" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">D3</text>
        <circle cx="275" cy="50" r="8" fill="#689f38" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
        <circle cx="325" cy="50" r="8" fill="#689f38" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      </g>
      <!-- D1 (left of walkway) -->
      <g id="table-d1-group">
        <circle id="table-d1" cx="480" cy="50" r="25" 
                fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
                data-number="D1" data-capacity="2"/>
        <text x="480" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">D1</text>
        <circle cx="455" cy="50" r="8" fill="#689f38" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
        <circle cx="505" cy="50" r="8" fill="#689f38" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      </g>
      <!-- D2 (right of walkway) -->
      <g id="table-d2-group">
        <circle id="table-d2" cx="720" cy="50" r="25" 
                fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
                data-number="D2" data-capacity="2"/>
        <text x="720" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">D2</text>
        <circle cx="695" cy="50" r="8" fill="#689f38" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
        <circle cx="745" cy="50" r="8" fill="#689f38" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      </g>
      <!-- D4 -->
      <g id="table-d4-group">
        <circle id="table-d4" cx="900" cy="50" r="25" 
                fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
                data-number="D4" data-capacity="2"/>
        <text x="900" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">D4</text>
        <circle cx="875" cy="50" r="8" fill="#689f38" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
        <circle cx="925" cy="50" r="8" fill="#689f38" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      </g>
      <!-- D6 (far right - extended beyond store) -->
      <g id="table-d6-group">
        <circle id="table-d6" cx="1100" cy="50" r="25" 
                fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
                data-number="D6" data-capacity="2"/>
        <text x="1100" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">D6</text>
        <circle cx="1075" cy="50" r="8" fill="#689f38" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
        <circle cx="1125" cy="50" r="8" fill="#689f38" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      </g>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Row C -->
    <g id="row-c-tables">
      <!-- C5 -->
      <g id="table-c5-group">
        <rect id="table-c5" x="50" y="120" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="C5" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="100" y="155" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">C5</text>
      </g>
      <!-- C3 -->
      <g id="table-c3-group">
        <rect id="table-c3" x="250" y="120" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="C3" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="300" y="155" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">C3</text>
      </g>
      <!-- C1 (left of walkway) -->
      <g id="table-c1-group">
        <rect id="table-c1" x="430" y="120" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="C1" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="480" y="155" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">C1</text>
      </g>
      <!-- C2 (right of walkway) -->
      <g id="table-c2-group">
        <rect id="table-c2" x="670" y="120" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="C2" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="720" y="155" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">C2</text>
      </g>
      <!-- C4 -->
      <g id="table-c4-group">
        <rect id="table-c4" x="850" y="120" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="C4" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="900" y="155" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">C4</text>
      </g>
      <!-- C6 -->
      <g id="table-c6-group">
        <rect id="table-c6" x="1050" y="120" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="C6" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="1100" y="155" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">C6</text>
      </g>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Row B -->
    <g id="row-b-tables">
      <!-- B7 (far left) -->
      <g id="table-b7-group">
        <rect id="table-b7" x="20" y="210" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="B7" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="70" y="245" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">B7</text>
      </g>
      <!-- B5 -->
      <g id="table-b5-group">
        <rect id="table-b5" x="150" y="210" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="B5" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="200" y="245" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">B5</text>
      </g>
      <!-- B3 -->
      <g id="table-b3-group">
        <rect id="table-b3" x="280" y="210" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="B3" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="330" y="245" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">B3</text>
      </g>
      <!-- B1 (left of walkway) -->
      <g id="table-b1-group">
        <rect id="table-b1" x="410" y="210" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="B1" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="460" y="245" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">B1</text>
      </g>
      <!-- B2 (right of walkway) -->
      <g id="table-b2-group">
        <rect id="table-b2" x="690" y="210" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="B2" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="740" y="245" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">B2</text>
      </g>
      <!-- B4 -->
      <g id="table-b4-group">
        <rect id="table-b4" x="820" y="210" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="B4" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="870" y="245" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">B4</text>
      </g>
      <!-- B6 -->
      <g id="table-b6-group">
        <rect id="table-b6" x="950" y="210" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="B6" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="1000" y="245" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">B6</text>
      </g>
      <!-- B8 (far right) -->
      <g id="table-b8-group">
        <rect id="table-b8" x="1080" y="210" width="100" height="60" rx="5"
              fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="B8" data-capacity="4"/>
        <text x="1130" y="245" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">B8</text>
      </g>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Row A (closest to window) -->
    <g id="row-a-tables">
      <!-- A5 -->
      <g id="table-a5-group">
        <circle id="table-a5" cx="300" cy="330" r="35" 
                fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
                data-number="A5" data-capacity="6"/>
        <text x="300" y="335" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">A5</text>
      </g>
      <!-- A3 -->
      <g id="table-a3-group">
        <circle id="table-a3" cx="430" cy="330" r="35" 
                fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
                data-number="A3" data-capacity="6"/>
        <text x="430" y="335" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">A3</text>
      </g>
      <!-- A1 (left of door/walkway) -->
      <g id="table-a1-group">
        <circle id="table-a1" cx="480" cy="330" r="25" 
                fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
                data-number="A1" data-capacity="2"/>
        <text x="480" y="335" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">A1</text>
      </g>
      <!-- A2 (right of door/walkway) -->
      <g id="table-a2-group">
        <circle id="table-a2" cx="720" cy="330" r="25" 
                fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
                data-number="A2" data-capacity="2"/>
        <text x="720" y="335" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">A2</text>
      </g>
      <!-- A4 -->
      <g id="table-a4-group">
        <circle id="table-a4" cx="770" cy="330" r="35" 
                fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
                data-number="A4" data-capacity="6"/>
        <text x="770" y="335" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">A4</text>
      </g>
      <!-- A6 -->
      <g id="table-a6-group">
        <circle id="table-a6" cx="900" cy="330" r="35" 
                fill="#8bc34a" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
                data-number="A6" data-capacity="6"/>
        <text x="900" y="335" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">A6</text>
      </g>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- INDOOR SECTION (Bottom) - Store width only -->
  <g id="indoor-section">
    <!-- Indoor background - gray for non-seating areas -->
    <rect x="200" y="400" width="800" height="600" fill="#f5f5f5" stroke="none"/>
    
    <!-- Indoor floor (seating area) -->
    <rect x="200" y="450" width="800" height="400" fill="#fff8e1" stroke="none"/>
    
    <!-- Window wall with door -->
    <rect x="200" y="400" width="800" height="50" fill="#e0e0e0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="2"/>
    <!-- Glass door in center -->
    <rect x="550" y="400" width="100" height="50" fill="#b3e5fc" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="600" y="430" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">Door</text>
    
    <!-- Indoor title -->
    <text x="600" y="480" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#795548">Indoor Dining Area</text>
    
    <!-- Table 1 (round, left of walkway by window) -->
    <g id="table-1-group">
      <circle id="table-1" cx="400" cy="550" r="40" 
              fill="#d4d4d4" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="1" data-capacity="4"/>
      <text x="400" y="555" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">1</text>
      <!-- Chairs -->
      <circle cx="360" cy="550" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="440" cy="550" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="400" cy="510" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="400" cy="590" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Table 2 (round, right of walkway by window) -->
    <g id="table-2-group">
      <circle id="table-2" cx="800" cy="550" r="40" 
              fill="#d4d4d4" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="2" data-capacity="4"/>
      <text x="800" y="555" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">2</text>
      <!-- Chairs -->
      <circle cx="760" cy="550" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="840" cy="550" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="800" cy="510" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="800" cy="590" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Table 3 (round, left by window) -->
    <g id="table-3-group">
      <circle id="table-3" cx="300" cy="550" r="40" 
              fill="#d4d4d4" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="3" data-capacity="4"/>
      <text x="300" y="555" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">3</text>
      <!-- Chairs -->
      <circle cx="260" cy="550" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="340" cy="550" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="300" cy="510" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="300" cy="590" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Table 4 (round, right by window) -->
    <g id="table-4-group">
      <circle id="table-4" cx="900" cy="550" r="40" 
              fill="#d4d4d4" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
              data-number="4" data-capacity="4"/>
      <text x="900" y="555" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">4</text>
      <!-- Chairs -->
      <circle cx="860" cy="550" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="940" cy="550" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="900" cy="510" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="900" cy="590" r="12" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Table 5 (rectangular, left wall with bench) -->
    <g id="table-5-group">
      <!-- Bench along wall -->
      <rect x="200" y="650" width="20" height="120" fill="#8d6e63" stroke="#5d4037" stroke-width="1"/>
      <!-- Table -->
      <rect id="table-5" x="220" y="670" width="120" height="80" rx="5"
            fill="#d4d4d4" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
            data-number="5" data-capacity="6"/>
      <text x="280" y="715" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">5</text>
      <!-- Chairs on outside -->
      <rect x="345" y="680" width="15" height="20" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <rect x="345" y="710" width="15" height="20" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <rect x="345" y="740" width="15" height="20" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Table 6 (rectangular, right wall with bench) -->
    <g id="table-6-group">
      <!-- Bench along wall -->
      <rect x="980" y="650" width="20" height="120" fill="#8d6e63" stroke="#5d4037" stroke-width="1"/>
      <!-- Table -->
      <rect id="table-6" x="860" y="670" width="120" height="80" rx="5"
            fill="#d4d4d4" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"
            data-number="6" data-capacity="6"/>
      <text x="920" y="715" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">6</text>
      <!-- Chairs on outside -->
      <rect x="840" y="680" width="15" height="20" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <rect x="840" y="710" width="15" height="20" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
      <rect x="840" y="740" width="15" height="20" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1"/>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Bar area (bottom center) - gray non-seating area -->
    <rect x="200" y="850" width="800" height="150" fill="#e0e0e0" stroke="none"/>
    <rect x="400" y="880" width="400" height="80" rx="10"
          fill="#795548" stroke="#5d4037" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="600" y="930" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" fill="#fff">Bar</text>
    
    <!-- Side gray areas (non-seating) -->
    <rect x="0" y="400" width="200" height="600" fill="#e0e0e0" stroke="none"/>
    <rect x="1000" y="400" width="200" height="600" fill="#e0e0e0" stroke="none"/>
  </g>
</svg>
